title: Blue
description: Grace has watched her sisters, Jamie and Kenzie, get married in the family's enchanted wedding dress. In truth she always longed to get married and have a family but went along with her sister.After Kenzie passes the dress on to Grace she discovers a letter from her grandmother asking Grace to take the dress back to Scotland, to the family home. Upon arriving in Scotland, the dress is almost stolen but rescued by a man she has seen once before.Grace visits her Gran's best friend and is given another letter. It contains specific instructions for Grace to try the dress on and what she is to do next. Everywhere she turns she bumps into Logan Campbell the man who saved her dress and stole her heart.How can she have the love she's longed for and still never leave her beloved sisters?
author: Lucinda Race
